description: This file defines the interface ILocalStore for a local storage system within the WPEFramework Plugin namespace, outlining methods for managing tables and entries.

classes.name: ILocalStore
classes.description: An interface for local storage operations such as opening a store, creating tables, setting limits, retrieving entries, and removing entries.

methods.name: Open
methods.description: Opens a local store at the specified path.

methods.name: CreateTable
methods.description: Creates a new table within the store.

methods.name: SetLimit
methods.description: Sets a limit on the number of entries in a table.

methods.name: GetEntriesCount
methods.description: Retrieves the count of entries in a table between start and maxCount.

methods.name: GetEntries
methods.description: Retrieves entries from a table starting at a specific index.

methods.name: RemoveEntries
methods.description: Removes entries from start to end indices in a table.

methods.name: AddEntry
methods.description: Adds a new entry to a specified table.
